attributes.action: More research into the use of antipsychotic medication, links to chronic illness
attributes.additional_details: I want to prove to people that antipsychotic medication is damaging physically to many individuals, I want to help raise awareness of the pain that being on these medications could potentially cause and we want more warnings from the medical professionals prescribing this kind of medication of the potential risks and side effects that can be had on the body! And that long term use needs more check ups and more monitoring from doctors!
attributes.background: The use of antipsychotic medication is now being used more often in mild cases of mental illness that potentially dont need antipsychotic medication for treatment and the long term effects of them is causing pain and the development on chronic illness in patients in long term use!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734895
